name: Lilac Insights
description: Lilac Insights is widely regarded as the pioneer in the field of Reproductive Genetics & Cancer Genetics in India. From introducing Prenatal genetic screening and diagnosis to cutting edge cancer genetics program, Lilac Insights has always been ahead of the curve. Lilac Insight follows the guidelines and protocols set by internationally renowned organization like Fetal Medicine Foundation (UK) & National Health Service (UK) in India and successfully shape the genetic screening and diagnostics industry of the country.
Headline: Passion, Commitment, Genetics

Highlights.name: Reproductive Genetics Program
Highlights.description: The most comprehensive range of reproductive genetic tests - offering end to end, evidence based, international quality standard investigations.

Highlights.name: Cancer Genetics Program
Highlights.description: The one stop solution in cancer genetics service program with unique testing panels for the first time in India.

Highlights.name: AtEase - An Inclusive Mental Health Platform
Highlights.description: An inclusive, safe space that helps you reclaim your fulfilling, enjoyable and purposeful life.

enhanced_description: Lilac Insights is a pioneering organization in Reproductive Genetics and Cancer Genetics in India, setting industry standards by adhering to guidelines from internationally renowned organizations like the Fetal Medicine Foundation (UK) and National Health Service (UK). With an extensive network of 5000+ hospital and nursing home tie-ups and trusted by 8000+ doctors, Lilac Insights has positively impacted over 850,000 patients. Beyond its core genetic diagnostics services, Lilac Insights offers 'AtEase', an inclusive mental health platform designed to support employee well-being, directly contributing to improved employee happiness and engagement.
